meanings.definition: A person who drinks heavily and frequently.
meanings.sent1: My uncle is known as one of the local bingers.
meanings.sent2: The group of bingers always gathers at the same bar every Friday night.
meanings.sent3: The bingers at the party were having a competition to see who could drink the most water.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bingers, he was the undisputed champion of beer pong.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bingers stumbling out of the bar was hard to forget.

meanings.sent1: After a stressful week, he went on a bingers spree over the weekend.
meanings.sent2: The holiday season is often associated with bingers and celebrations.
meanings.sent3: The bingers at the wedding reception made sure the open bar was put to good use.
meanings.sent4: The bingers of summer were like a storm that swept through the town.
meanings.sent5: The bingers of history often left behind tales of wild nights and blurry memories.
